on_entry: /execute @s ~~~ tellraw @a {"rawtext":[{"text":"§3【Jockey】 ["},{"selector":"@s"},{"text":"] 死亡！"}]}
/execute @s[tag=游戏中] ~~~ playsound jockey.death @a
/execute @s[tag=!游戏中] ~~~ playsound jockey.death @a[r=32]
/execute @s[tag=jockey_skill] ~~~ stopsound @a[r=18] jockey.skill
/execute @s[tag=jockey_skill] ~~~ event entity @e[family=player,tag=jockey_riding,tag=!neutral,c=1] coldsink:jockey_control_over
/execute @s[tag=jockey_skill] ~~~ tag @e[family=player,tag=jockey_riding,tag=!neutral,c=1] remove jockey_riding
/summon coldsink:dead_jockey
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage] ~~~ event entity @e[type=coldsink:dead_jockey,c=1] despawn
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=melee_no_kill] ~~~ event entity @e[type=coldsink:dead_jockey,c=1] despawn
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=!melee_no_kill] ~~~ tellraw @a {"rawtext":[{"text":"§b"},{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" 被近战武器杀死，本局无法复活"}]}
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=!melee_no_kill] ~~~ playsound sfzombie_killed @a
/execute @s[tag=melee_damage,tag=!melee_no_kill] ~~~ function game/dead_keep_score
/tag @s[tag=melee_no_kill] remove melee_damage
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 忆知艾郎得晓愣沉
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=绿画娜] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 绿画娜
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=飙啼菌] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 飙啼菌
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=普罗陀] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 普罗陀
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=狼掏谜纸] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 狼掏谜纸
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=鸡姬] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 鸡姬
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=禽疯] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 禽疯
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=佬僵] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 佬僵
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=集锋迫小] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 集锋迫小
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=瘤皇蒜黄] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 瘤皇蒜黄
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=水药] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 水药
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=麟蔑] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 麟蔑
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=碍登] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 碍登
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=牛腩面面] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 牛腩面面
/execute @s[tag=!melee_damage,name=蚕币] ~~~ summon coldsink:respawn_sfzombie 蚕币
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉,c=1] game_score = @s[name=忆知艾郎得晓愣沉] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=绿画娜,c=1] game_score = @s[name=绿画娜] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=飙啼菌,c=1] game_score = @s[name=飙啼菌] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=普罗陀,c=1] game_score = @s[name=普罗陀] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=狼掏谜纸,c=1] game_score = @s[name=狼掏谜纸] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=鸡姬,c=1] game_score = @s[name=鸡姬] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=禽疯,c=1] game_score = @s[name=禽疯] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=佬僵,c=1] game_score = @s[name=佬僵] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=集锋迫小,c=1] game_score = @s[name=集锋迫小] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=瘤皇蒜黄,c=1] game_score = @s[name=瘤皇蒜黄] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=水药,c=1] game_score = @s[name=水药] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=麟蔑,c=1] game_score = @s[name=麟蔑] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=碍登,c=1] game_score = @s[name=碍登] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=牛腩面面,c=1] game_score = @s[name=牛腩面面] game_score
/scoreboard players operation @e[type=!coldsink:jockey_ai,name=蚕币,c=1] game_score = @s[name=蚕币] game_score
/event entity @s godie
